pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Exponential-Family Models for Rank- Order Relational Data // A set of extensions for the 'ergm' package to fit weighted networks whose edge weights are ranks. See Krivitsky and Butts (2017) doi:10.1177/0081175017692623 and Krivitsky, Hunter, Morris, and Klumb (2023) doi:10.18637/jss.v105.i06.
